issue.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
Found dynamic locale changes, but did not find corresponding Play Core library calls for downloading languages and splitting by language is not disabled in the `bundle` configuration
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.android than 2.1.0 is available: 2.3.0
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.plugin.compose than 2.1.0 is available: 2.3.0
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.plugin.serialization than 2.1.0 is available: 2.3.0
Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter

issue.errorLine1: <string name="dm_empty_subtitle">When someone messages you, you’ll see it here.</string>
<string name="dm_kids_disabled_body">Direct Messages are disabled for kids mode (under 13). A parent can change this in Settings → Safety & Parental Controls.</string>
<string name="dm_safety_body">If something feels wrong, report abusive messages. Under-13 accounts can’t use DMs.</string>
<string name="dm_block_confirm_body">They won’t be able to message you, and this conversation will be hidden.</string>
<string name="dm_unblock_confirm_body">They’ll be able to message you again.</string>
<string name="dm_rate_limited">Too many messages. Please slow down.</string>
<string name="dm_send_failed">Message failed to send. Tap and retry.</string>
<string name="settings_badges_subtitle">View your earned achievements and goals.</string>
<string name="settings_nuke_db_dialog_text">This will permanently delete all posts from the server. This action cannot be undone.</string>
<string name="settings_language_test_subtitle">Set app language manually. Requires app restart.</string>
<string name="story_delete_dialog_text">This will permanently delete this story. This action cannot be undone.</string>

issue.message: The resource string "nav_messages" has been marked as translatable="false" elsewhere (usually in the `values` folder), but is translated to "ar" (Arabic) here
The resource string "nav_messages" has been marked as translatable="false" elsewhere (usually in the `values` folder), but is translated to "es" (Spanish) here

The resource string "nav_messages" has been marked as translatable="false" elsewhere (usually in the `values` folder), but is translated to "sv" (Swedish) here
The resource string "nav_messages" has been marked as translatable="false" elsewhere (usually in the `values` folder), but is translated to "tr" (Turkish) here
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
